title: community contributor | How to port a car | Jason Young | COMMA_CON talks | openpilot | Volkswagen
description:
Date of the stream 29 Jul 2023.
from $1250 - comma 3X https://comma.ai/shop/comma-3x & best ADAS system in the world - https://openpilot.comma.ai

00:00 intro
00:15 technology hobbies friend 
00:45 Golf R VW MQB

03:30 bad signs

04:05 automotive ethernet

04:40 toyota security

05:46 development environment

06:29 comma 3x with developer harness

06:58 diagnostic tool for the car, multimeter, wire cutters, crimper
07:15 developer harness
08:08 wire mapping using manufacturer wiring diagram
09:01 reading messages from the car
09:26 cabana
09:49 thank you github.com/deanlee
10:19 wheel speeds
11:58 gas and brake
12:45 brake pressed signal
13:51 steering inputs
15:53 can dbc from cabana to openpilot carstate
16:22 lane keeping assist messages
17:44 payload checksums and counters
20:06 openpilot carcontroller to openpilot can message packer
21:05 2019 first drive
21:40 improved testing infrastructure
22:00 good signs
22:25 lockout
22:50 camera enforced lockout
23:05 Mazda, Old Fords, EPS enforced lockout
23:40 cleanup, quality work
24:03 2023 first drive
24:50 9 hours to port a car
25:35 guidelines for upstream support
25:45 needs to be safe
26:10 supportable, needs to work like other openpilot cars
26:50 the quality of openpilot, bugs in the car
27:28 needs to be marketable
27:43 fully plug-and-play, fully reversible
